From the Desk of Justia

Law Firm Associates: Set Yourself Up for Greater Success in the Post-Pandemic World

Getting ahead in the legal profession often takes more than just legal acumen. Long-term success also requires a strategic approach to building a strong reputation and professional network. Check out this Justia Webinar exploring strategies law firm associates can employ to build this foundation for achievement.

Justia Team | November 16, 2023

Promoting Success by Reducing Bias in Recruitment and Talent Management at Your Law Firm

Data shows that focusing on diversity and inclusion not only improves your business’ recruitment and retention efforts but also increases the company’s profitability and performance. To learn more about inclusive talent management for your law firm, view this recent Justia Webinar.

Justia Team | November 8, 2023

Justia Legal Guides: Medical Malpractice Law Center

When people go to the doctor, they expect to get better rather than worse. Unfortunately, this doesn’t always happen. Justia provides a Medical Malpractice Law Center to help inform injured patients about their legal options.

Chris Skelton | November 10, 2023

Featured Q&A

Answer: Under Oklahoma law you are required to yield at railroad crossings. Accordingly...
